caption: Talonflame, Blaziken – Ruins of a mausoleum near the north-western end of the Great Colonnade, Palmyra. In the interior there is a large sarcophagus richly ornamented with sculptured satyrs and garlands of flowers and fruit; another mausoleum near it, in better preservation, is shown on page 435.
